section.name: Getting Started with OpenJMS
section.p: The purpose of this document is to get an "out-of-the-box" OpenJMS server running. It is intended to be the quickest path to the OpenJMS experience.

subsection.name: Overview of the Getting Started Documentation

tr.td: Before you can start using OpenJMS, you need to download the OpenJMS distribution to your system. This document provides links to the various distributions available.
After you have downloaded a distribution, you need to install this on your system before you can start using OpenJMS. This document provides step-by-step instructions on the installation process.
Once you've installed OpenJMS, you need to start the OpenJMS server. This document provides the commands to run OpenJMS.
This document provides code samples on using OpenJMS.
OpenJMS is distributed with a number of example programs that demonstrate writing simple applications using JMS. This document describes how to build and run the examples.
